title: Custom brush and more, v2.9.0
content:
FEATURE:
- Custom brushes. Importable and exportable as ".pxbr" files.

ENHANCEMENTS:
- Reworked the spray brush, it sprays the current brush instead of just 1 pixel
- Optimization for tilemap tools
- Mouse's input can draw in only-pencil mode
- Tilemap layers can be converted to regular layers

FIX:
- Memory leak when using symmetry tool or tilemap layers
